subject: Australian Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Andy Roddick found himself down a set against Jo-Wilfried Tsonga of France on Monday, but fought back to take the first-round match. Roger Federer and Amélie Mauresmo were also victorious.
snippet: Andy Roddick found himself down a set against Jo-Wilfried Tsonga of France on Monday, but fought back to take the first-round match. Roger Federer and Amélie Mauresmo were also victorious.
